## Installation

You can install azmpdata from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("casaultb/azmpdata")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows how to search which datasets contain chlorophyll data:

```{r example}
library(azmpdata)
search_azmpdata("chlorophyll")
```
